00020 template<typename oT>
00021 inline
00022 field<oT>::~field()
00023   {
00024   arma_extra_debug_sigprint(arma_boost::format("this = %x") % this);
00025   
00026   delete_objects();
00027   
00028   if(n_elem > sizeof(mem_local)/sizeof(oT*) )
00029     {
00030     delete [] mem;
00031     }
00032   
00033   if(arma_config::debug == true)
00034     {
00035     mem = 0;  // try to expose buggy code that still accesses a deleted 'field'
00036     }
00037   }
00038

00046   , n_elem(0)
00047   , mem(0)
00048   {
00049   arma_extra_debug_sigprint(arma_boost::format("this = %x") % this);
00050   }

00054 //! construct a field from a given field
00055 template<typename oT>
00056 inline
00057 field<oT>::field(const field& x)
00058   : n_rows(0)
00059   , n_cols(0)
00060   , n_elem(0)
00061   , mem(0)
00062   {
00063   arma_extra_debug_sigprint(arma_boost::format("this = %x   x = %x") % this % &x);
00064   
00065   init(x);
00066   }

00084 //! construct a field from subview_field (e.g. construct a field from a delayed subfield operation)
00085 template<typename oT>
00086 inline
00087 field<oT>::field(const subview_field<oT>& X)
00088   : n_rows(0)
00089   , n_cols(0)
00090   , n_elem(0)
00091   , mem(0)
00092   {
00093   arma_extra_debug_sigprint_this(this);
00094   
00095   this->operator=(X);
00096   }

00100 //! construct a field from subview_field (e.g. construct a field from a delayed subfield operation)
00101 template<typename oT>
00102 inline
00103 const field<oT>&
00104 field<oT>::operator=(const subview_field<oT>& X)
00105   {
00106   arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
00107   
00108   subview_field<oT>::extract(*this, X);
00109   return *this;
00110   }

00198   {

00217 //! element accessor; bounds checking not done when ARMA_NO_DEBUG is defined
00218 template<typename oT>
00219 inline
00220 oT&
00221 field<oT>::operator() (const u32 in_row, const u32 in_col)
00222   {
00223   arma_debug_check( ((in_row >= n_rows) || (in_col >= n_cols)), "field::operator(): index out of bounds");
00224   return (*mem[in_row + in_col*n_rows]);
00225   }

00263 //! creation of subview_field (row of a field)
00264 template<typename oT>
00265 inline
00266 subview_field<oT>
00267 field<oT>::row(const u32 row_num)
00268   {
00269   arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
00270   
00271   arma_debug_check( (row_num >= n_rows), "field::row(): row out of bounds" );
00272   return subview_field<oT>(*this, row_num, 0, row_num, n_cols-1);
00273   }

00319 //! creation of subview_field (subfield comprised of specified rows)
00320 template<typename oT>
00321 inline
00322 subview_field<oT>
00323 field<oT>::rows(const u32 in_row1, const u32 in_row2)
00324   {
00325   arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
00326   
00327   arma_debug_check( ((in_row1 >= n_rows) || (in_row2 >= n_rows) ), "field::rows(): out of bounds" );
00328   arma_debug_check( (in_row1 >  in_row2), "field::rows(): incorrect usage" );
00329   
00330   return subview_field<oT>(*this, in_row1, 0, in_row2, n_cols-1);
00331   }

00382 
00383 //! creation of subview_field (subfield)
00384 template<typename oT>
00385 inline
00386 subview_field<oT>
00387 field<oT>::subfield(const u32 in_row1, const u32 in_col1, const u32 in_row2, const u32 in_col2)
00388   {
00389   arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
00390   
00391   arma_debug_check
00392     (
00393     (in_row1 >= n_rows)
00394     ||
00395     (in_col1 >= n_cols)
00396     ||
00397     (in_row2 >= n_rows)
00398     ||
00399     (in_col2 >= n_cols)
00400     ,
00401     "field::subfield(): out of bounds"
00402     );
00403   
00404   arma_debug_check
00405     (
00406     (in_row1 >  in_row2)
00407     ||
00408     (in_col1 >  in_col2)
00409     ,
00410     "field::subfield(): incorrect usage"
00411     );
00412   
00413   return subview_field<oT>(*this, in_row1, in_col1, in_row2, in_col2);
00414   }

00418 //! creation of subview_field (generic submatrix)
00419 template<typename oT>
00420 inline
00421 const subview_field<oT>
00422 field<oT>::subfield(const u32 in_row1, const u32 in_col1, const u32 in_row2, const u32 in_col2) const
00423   {
00424   arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
00425   
00426   arma_debug_check
00427     (
00428     (in_row1 >= n_rows)
00429     ||
00430     (in_col1 >= n_cols)
00431     ||
00432     (in_row2 >= n_rows)
00433     ||
00434     (in_col2 >= n_cols)
00435     ,
00436     "field::subfield(): out of bounds"
00437     );
00438   
00439   arma_debug_check
00440     (
00441     (in_row1 >  in_row2)
00442     ||
00443     (in_col1 >  in_col2)
00444     ,
00445     "field::subfield(): incorrect usage"
00446     );
00447   
00448   return subview_field<oT>(*this, in_row1, in_col1, in_row2, in_col2);
00449   }

00453 //! print contents of the field, optionally preceding with a user specified line of text
00454 template<typename oT>
00455 inline
00456 void
00457 field<oT>::print(const std::string extra_text) const
00458   {
00459   arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
00460   
00461   if(extra_text.length() != 0)
00462     {
00463     cout << extra_text << '\n';
00464     }
00465   
00466   cout << *this << '\n';
00467   }

00471 //! fill the field with an object
00472 template<typename oT>
00473 inline
00474 void
00475 field<oT>::fill(const oT& x)
00476   {
00477   arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
00478   
00479   field<oT>& t = *this;
00480   
00481   for(u32 i=0; i<n_elem; ++i)
00482     {
00483     t[i] = x;
00484     }
00485   }

00537 //! construct a field from a given field
00538 template<typename oT>
00539 inline
00540 void
00541 field<oT>::init(const field<oT>& x)
00542   {
00543   arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
00544   
00545   if(this != &x)
00546     {
00547     init(x.n_rows, x.n_cols);
00548     
00549     field& t = *this;
00550     
00551     for(u32 col=0; col<x.n_cols; ++col)
00552     for(u32 row=0; row<x.n_rows; ++row)
00553       {
00554       t.at(row,col) = x.at(row,col);
00555       }
00556     }
00557   
00558   }
00559 
00560 
00561 
00562 //! internal field construction; if the requested size is small enough, memory from the stack is used. otherwise memory is allocated via 'new'
00563 template<typename oT>
00564 inline
00565 void
00566 field<oT>::init(const u32 n_rows_in, const u32 n_cols_in)
00567   {
00568   arma_extra_debug_sigprint( arma_boost::format("n_rows_in = %d, n_cols_in = %d") % n_rows_in % n_cols_in );
00569   
00570   const u32 n_elem_new = n_rows_in * n_cols_in;
00571 
00572   if(n_elem == n_elem_new)
00573     {
00574     // delete_objects();
00575     // create_objects();
00576     access::rw(n_rows) = n_rows_in;
00577     access::rw(n_cols) = n_cols_in;
00578     }
00579   else
00580     {
00581     delete_objects();
00582     
00583     if(n_elem > sizeof(mem_local)/sizeof(oT*) )
00584       {
00585       delete [] mem;
00586       }
00587     
00588     if(n_elem_new <= sizeof(mem_local)/sizeof(oT*) )
00589       {
00590       mem = mem_local;
00591       }
00592     else
00593       {
00594       mem = new(std::nothrow) oT* [n_elem_new];
00595       arma_check( (mem == 0), "field::init(): out of memory" );
00596       }
00597     
00598     access::rw(n_elem) = n_elem_new;
00599     
00600     if(n_elem_new == 0)
00601       {
00602       access::rw(n_rows) = 0;
00603       access::rw(n_cols) = 0;
00604       }
00605     else
00606       {
00607       access::rw(n_rows) = n_rows_in;
00608       access::rw(n_cols) = n_cols_in;
00609       }
00610     
00611     create_objects();
00612     
00613     }
00614   
00615   }
00616 
00617 
00618 
00619 template<typename oT>
00620 inline
00621 void
00622 field<oT>::delete_objects()
00623   {
00624   arma_extra_debug_sigprint( arma_boost::format("n_elem = %d") % n_elem );
00625   
00626   for(u32 i=0; i<n_elem; ++i)
00627     {
00628     if(mem[i] != 0)
00629       {
00630       delete mem[i];
00631       mem[i] = 0;
00632       }
00633     }
00634   
00635   }
00636 
00637 
00638 
00639 template<typename oT>
00640 inline
00641 void
00642 field<oT>::create_objects()
00643   {
00644   arma_extra_debug_sigprint( arma_boost::format("n_elem = %d") % n_elem );
00645   
00646   for(u32 i=0; i<n_elem; ++i)
00647     {
00648     mem[i] = new oT;
00649     }
00650   
00651   }

00661 template<typename oT>
00662 inline
00663 void
00664 field_aux::reset_objects(field<oT>& x)
00665   {
00666   arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
00667   
00668   x.delete_objects();
00669   x.create_objects();
00670   }

00674 template<typename eT>
00675 inline
00676 void
00677 field_aux::reset_objects(field< basic_mat<eT> >& x)
00678   {
00679   arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
00680   
00681   for(u32 i=0; i<x.n_elem; ++i)
00682     {
00683     (*(x.mem[i])).reset();
00684     }
00685   }
